link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Value of Owned Fund reported in Part7 = (Ordinary Shares + Convertible Preference Shares + Total Reserves & Surplus - Revaluation reserves - Share Application Money Pending Allotment reported in Part 1)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total adjustments to calculate owned funds = (Accumulated balance of loss + Deferred Revenue Expenditure + Deferred Tax Asset (Net) + Other Intangible Assets + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Owned Fund should = (Owned Fund (from Part 1) - Total adjustments to calculate owned funds)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total adjustments to calculate net owned funds = (Investment in shares of Subsidiaries + Investment in shares of Companies in the same Group + Investment in shares of Other non-banking financial companies + Book value of debentures, bonds, outstanding loans and advances, bills purchased and discounted (including hire-purchase and lease finance) made to, and deposits with subsidiaries + Book value of debentures, bonds, outstanding loans and advances, bills purchased and discounted (including hire-purchase and lease finance) made to, and deposits with Companies in the same Group)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Amount of item (ix) in excess of 10% of item (vi) above - Total Adjustment to calculate net owned funds in excess of owned funds = (Total Adjustment to calculate net owned funds - (0.10 X Owned funds); Else Value of Amount of item (ix) in excess of 10% of item (vi) above - Total Adjustment to calculate net owned funds in excess of owned funds = Total Adjustment to calculate net owned funds, if Owned funds < 0)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Net Owned Funds = ((Owned funds - Total adjustments to calculate net owned funds in excess of owned funds); Else Value of Net Owned Funds = (Owned funds - Total adjustment to calculate net owned funds))" do no tally.
Identity "Value of Total financial assets = (Total Loans & Advances + Hire Purchase and Lease Assets + Investments)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of [Financial Assets to Total Assets (%) = (Total Financial Assets / Total Assets)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Financial Income/Total Income (%) = (Total Income from Financial Business / Total Income)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Leverage Ratio = (Total Borrowings + Current Liabilities from Part1/ Owned Fund from Part4)" do not tally.
